title: 10 Ways to Make a Workout Fun, Even If You Hate Working Out
summary: If you’re tired of the same old running or cycling classes, consider taking a new exercise class. Working out with friends can be one of the best ways to stay motivated and make a workout fun. Set realistic goals for yourself that you can achieve in your workouts. If you hate working out so much you can’t imagine ever enjoying it, consider committing to a short workout only. Consider choosing a good music mix for your workout, especially if you're doing an indoor workout.
